rounds.comments: (Alex: We will give you a clue that leads you to the first three letters of a state.  You have to give us the state, however.)

The Poor Knights of Christ became known by this name after occupying a house near the Temple of Solomon

If one of these lands on you, good luck should be coming your way, but you can still urge it to "fly away home"

rounds.text: The word coined for these substances in 1912 was meant to suggest they were essential to life & contained nitrogen
